info.title: The Catachthonic
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Cool but not done yet.

Controls:
Pointer = Aim
Analog stick = Move
A button = Change view
B button = Do something
Left/Right = Do something else
C button = Jump
1 button = Reset world
